questions.question: What two qualities did God pronounce on the seventh day (Gen. 2:2)?

choices.answer: He blessed it and made it holy
He blessed it and pronounced it good
He pronounced it good and holy
He made its morning holy and its evening blessed

questions.question: When did humankind become a living being/soul (Gen. 2:7)?

choices.answer: WhenGod shaped the human in His image
WhenGod took Eve out of Adam's side
WhenGod placed the human in the garden
When God breathed into the human's nostrils

questions.question: What did God say was the consequence of eating from the forbidden tree (Gen. 2:17)?

choices.answer: Theywould be cast out of the garden
Theywould die
Theywould be cursed
Thegarden would perish

questions.question: How have the people wearied God with their words (Mal 2:17)?

choices.answer: Bysaying the Lord does not know what they are doing
Bysaying God will forgive us this day
Bysaying they had offered sacrifices so their sins were covered
Bysaying all who do evil are good in the eyes of the Lord

questions.question: The Lord says he will come in judgment against those who do not _____ (Mal 3:5)

choices.answer: Fearhim
Trusthim
Obeyhim
Seekhim
